review: Apple TV is my favorite. They have the best channels, and continue to add more. News, Music, Pictures, Video,  work flawlessly. Apple also has the nicest GUI.  If you have an iPad, iPhone, or macbook, this is the Best product to buy. Photo Stream, iTunes , sharing and mirroring, work amazing.I have tried Roku, Dlink, and Amazon as well.  The Amazon fire TV is also very good for some consumers because it has the voice search and can download apps.  I personally think the Apple is by far the best and nicest.

review: ....this is unfortunately going to go against Apple when it shouldn't, but we have no where to review delivery services so this is where it will go.  Whomever "delivered" this package put it on the ground by my mailbox.  You know, the area that is covered with all the snow that every passing snow plow pushes on to the end of my driveway.  I looked online to find out where my items were and they showed delivered.  I looked on my front porch.  I looked on my back porch.  I looked in my mailbox.  I looked by my garage.  My items were no where to be found.  Then as I dragged my trash cans in from the street, I noticed a piece of plastic peeking out of the road sludge pile of death at the end of the driveway.  After the week old ice crystals tore through my new gloves, I was able to unearth the package and discover the origin of the mysterious plastic.  My new Apple TV...buried under 2 days of salt, road sludge and snow.  Good work, delivery team.  Way to do the absolute minimum.  You should be awarded for your efforts.  I will let you know if the product works after it thaws/dries out.....
author: L. Starck
